creditline: Given by the children of Judson and Barbara White Bemis in memory of Edwin and Anne T. White
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: red silk body embroidered overall with birds, flowers and moths; medallions on chest and back embroidered with pairs of figures; pink lining
